member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.HostingEnvironmentExtensions.IsDevelopment(Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment)
member.summary: Checks if the current hosting environment name is "Development".
member.returns: True if the environment name is "Development", otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.HostingEnvironmentExtensions.IsStaging(Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment)
member.summary: Checks if the current hosting environment name is "Staging".
member.returns: True if the environment name is "Staging", otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.HostingEnvironmentExtensions.IsProduction(Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment)
member.summary: Checks if the current hosting environment name is "Production".
member.returns: True if the environment name is "Production", otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.HostingEnvironmentExtensions.IsEnvironment(Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment,System.String)
member.summary: Compares the current hosting environment name against the specified value.
member.returns: True if the specified name is the same as the current environment, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.HostingEnvironmentExtensions.MapPath(Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment,System.String)
member.summary: Determines the physical path corresponding to the given virtual path.
member.param: Path relative to the application root.
member.returns: Physical path corresponding to the virtual path.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IApplicationLifetime
member.summary: Allows consumers to perform cleanup during a graceful shutdown.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStarted
member.summary: Triggered when the application host has fully started and is about to wait for a graceful shutdown.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopping
member.summary: Triggered when the application host is performing a graceful shutdown. Request may still be in flight. Shutdown will block until this event completes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopped
member.summary: Triggered when the application host is performing a graceful shutdown. All requests should be complete at this point. Shutdown will block until this event completes.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment
member.summary: Provides information about the web hosting environment an application is running in.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.EnvironmentName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the environment. This property is automatically set by the host to the value of the "Hosting:Environment" (on Windows) or "Hosting__Environment" (on Linux & OS X) environment variable.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.WebRootPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the absolute path to the directory that contains the web-servable application content files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.WebRootFileProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets an pointing at .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.Configuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration object used by hosting environment.
